path: artifacts/MicroSHIBA Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.Microshiba: contracts/MicroSHIBA Full Smart Contract Security Audit/Microshiba

findings.title: No vulnerabilities found
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any security issues or vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` use loops that can lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.
